channel.title: Material Processing on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Material Processing on Home

item.title: Laser cutting
item.description: Laser Genius+ 2040 6kW, PRIMA POWER, (Fiber technology) Laser Genius+ is combined with the new fiber laser head, new electronics and innovative mounting for the optics and centering system, guarantee a maximum level of precision and cutting quality. Parameters Value Axis strokes X: 4 320 mm, Y: 2 200 mm, Z: 150 mm Laser power 6 000 W (max. thickness of standard steel, stainless steel and aluminium is 25 mm) Maximum piece weight 2000kg Positioning accuracy and repeatability X, Y: 0,03 mm Speed 130/min (trajectory 180m/min) Acceleration 2,8 g
